name: My "Now" page.
body:
# My "Now" Page, inspired by Tom Frank.

Here are a list of few things which I'm currently working on. I will be recording both my failures and achievements to lead an empiricistictal way of life.  

* Setting up Github pages. (90% done)

* Clocking 3 km under 15 mins, i.e 1 km every 5 minutes,but still have the energy left to further run 2 km in 12 mins. (Currently at 1km/6mins).

* What am I currently reading ? - The Power of Habit, Charles Duhigg

* Creating and maintaining a book review section on this website.

* Studying the machine learning packages on python. "sklearn". Simultaneously,start working on kaggle datasets. 

* What is keeping me awake ? - Implementing my own Football statistical index to forecast player performance for the upcoming weeks.

* Trying to be up-to-date with this course on coursera: "The Power of Macroeconomics: Economic Principles in the Real World" 

Much more to be added soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
